segments.text: My heart is really racing watching that boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so close to reaching the cookies, but his footing looks terribly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed outwards, barely holding his weight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep expecting it to give way at any second, sending him crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His concentration is entirely on that cookie jar, oblivious to the danger he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder he hasn't toppled already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl below him seems equally focused on the prize, not the peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One swift movement and that whole precarious setup could come down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the clatter of the falling stool and the breaking plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he hits his head on the counter on the way down?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is far more dangerous than just a simple cookie theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s astonishing how he manages to maintain his balance even with that stretch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every muscle in his body must be strained right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone intervenes before a real accident occurs.
segments.speaker: PAR
